definitions: denoting a point in a network or diagram at which lines or pathways intersect or branch

examples.text: pencil lines overlap at some nodal points
it is a nodal point for the railroads, connecting with all major cities of Poland

shortDefinitions: denoting point in network at which lines intersect

definitions: relating to the part of a plant stem from which one or more leaves emerge, often forming a slight swelling

examples.text: the nodal roots develop about an inch above the seed

shortDefinitions: relating to part of plant stem from which leaves emerge

definitions: relating to or characterized by a lymph node or other structure consisting of a small mass of differentiated tissue
shortDefinitions: relating to structure consisting of small mass of tissue
